Comments.Message: Implemented for Excel2007 and Excel5 Readers. This feature may be particularly useful to extract a list of worksheet names before loading individual worksheets with setLoadSheetsOnly()
Now implemented for all appropriate Readers (Excel2007, Excel5, Excel2003XML, OOCalc and Gnumeric)

Oops, sorry about the messed up formatting; I assumed that the <pre> tags would be rendered appropriately, but it doesn't seem like they are. Anyway, here is a link to the code snippet in Pastebin. 

http://pastebin.com/qS3QcSAZ
